Arjun Rampal’s Mother Passes Away, He Thanks Friends & Family For Support In An Emotional Post
Arjun Rampal’s Mother Passes Away, He Thanks Friends & Family For Support In An Emotional Post
Arjun Rampal’s mother Gwen Rampal was suffering from cancer for quite some time now. The actor’s mom took her last breathe on October 27th. He performed the last rites where his close friends and family members came to support him. The actor is clearly devastated by this huge loss. He penned down an emotional note on his mom's death and even thanked his close friends and family for being there for him.
Arjun had also tweeted about his mother’s cancer a few months ago saying how she won this 4 -ear battle of cancer, “Cancer is becoming more and more epidemic these days. My mother underwent a treatment for it and was cured. But 10 months later, cancer metastasized into her lungs and then with the help of my friend, we went to Champali Maud Foundation research centre in Lisbon.”
